00027 
00028 smpc_solver::smpc_solver (
00029                 const int N,
00030                 const solver_type sol_type,
00031                 const double Alpha, const double Beta, const double Gamma,
00032                 const double regularization, const double tol)
00033 {
00034     if (sol_type == SMPC_AS)
00035     {
00036         qp_sol = new qp_as (N, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol);
00037     }
00038     else if (sol_type == SMPC_IP)
00039     {
00040         qp_sol = new qp_ip (N, Alpha, Beta, Gamma, regularization, tol);
00041     }
00042 }

00045 smpc_solver::~smpc_solver()
00046 {
00047     if (qp_sol != NULL)
00048     {
00049         delete qp_sol;
00050     }
00051 }

00055 void smpc_solver::set_ip_parameters (
00056         const double t,
00057         const double mu,
00058         const double bs_alpha,
00059         const double bs_beta,
00060         const int max_iter,
00061         const double tol_out)
00062 {
00063     qp_ip * qpip_solver = dynamic_cast<qp_ip*> (qp_sol);
00064     if (qpip_solver != NULL)
00065     {
00066         qpip_solver->set_ip_parameters (t, mu, bs_alpha, bs_beta, max_iter, tol_out);
00067     }
00068 }

00100 int smpc_solver::solve()
00101 {
00102     if (qp_sol != NULL)
00103     {
00104         return (qp_sol->solve ());
00105     }
00106     return (-1);
00107 }
